articles.description: It offers hope for treatment and ultimately a vaccine against coronavirus.
articles.content:
It is hoped the antibody will lead to treatment and ultimately a vaccine against coronavirus (Picture: Getty)
A group of scientists have discovered an antibody that appears to prevent coronavirus from infecting human cells.

articles.title: Government says who will get vaccine first once it is ready - Wales Online
articles.description: There has also been discussion of whether the jab will be compulsory
articles.content:
A vaccine for Covid-19 is likely to be available to adults before children, Englands deputy chief medical officer has said.
Speaking at the daily Number 10 press conference on Monday, Professor Jonathan Van-Tam said a vaccine may be first licensed for adults… [+2249 chars]
